channel.title: Hi from Paul at Yellow Beetle
channel.description:
Hi, sorry I read the entry about writing an intro as you first post after I'd made my first post!
I'm just starting out, I've been doing design and development work for organisations I have links to for a while but I'm now going to give it a go getting people to pay me for it. The company doesn't even properly exist yet but I've got the name - Yellow Beetle!

item.title: Hi from Paul at Yellow Beetle
item.dc:creator: andrey
item.description:
Hi Paul. Welcome to the forums!

Read full topic
item.source: Hi from Paul at Yellow Beetle
